sentences.english: This paper also introduces the dual-speed control system and the realization of the function.
sentences.chinese: 还详述了双调速系统，及所实现的功能。

sentences.english: This is not too serious, so I won't dwell on it.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题并不太严重，在此就不再详述了。

sentences.english: In addition, a classification system and a set of interpretation keys for l…
sentences.chinese: 文中还详述了分类体系和土地利用调查的判读标志。

sentences.english: This is a big help, as you'll see later.
sentences.chinese: 这无疑是一个很大的帮助，本文稍候会详述。

sentences.english: Does the term "Aal izz well" indicate some social or cultural meaning? Please detail it.
sentences.chinese: 一词是否显示某些社会或文化之意义？请详述之。

sentences.english: The sentences in the construction are its instantiations and elaborations.
sentences.chinese: 这类句子例示或详述的是双数量词构式。

sentences.english: The video details a systematic process for developing the crawl stroke "from the inside out."
sentences.chinese: 视频详述了发展爬泳的系统过程“从内向外。”

sentences.english: If 'yes', please give details of the offence and the sentence imposed.
sentences.chinese: 如答案为‘是’，请详述犯罪事实与判罚。

sentences.english: The characteristics of sea water and brine magnesia are described.
sentences.chinese: 详述了海水与卤水镁砂的特点。

sentences.english: This object has four attributes and two methods, which are described below.
sentences.chinese: 该对象有四个属性和两个方法，详述如下。

sentences.english: She detailed her plans to me.
sentences.chinese: 她向我详述了她的计划。

sentences.english: For some, the recounting is the hardest part of recovering.
sentences.chinese: 对一些人来说，详述是恢复中最难的部分。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the parameter optimization and construction method of smooth blasting of horse-head ingate.
sentences.chinese: 文中详述了马头门光面爆破参数的优化及施工方法。

sentences.english: The speaker dwelt on that point for more than an hour.
sentences.chinese: 那个讲演者详述这个观点长达一个多小时。

sentences.english: This paper discusses eight phenomena occurring in real information colleting and editing.
sentences.chinese: 本文详述了现实工作中编采矛盾的八种表象。

sentences.english: The algorithm of firing impulses for single and double rectifier bridge is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 详述了单整流桥和双整流桥的触发脉冲的算法。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to say more than is necessary/to give unnecessary details
thorough and detailed/exhaustive/the tedious details in full
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to omit/to delete/to leave out/to neglect/to skip over
